abstract: According to Chinese media reports, the mother of the toddler killed in a hit-and-run accident that shocked the country says a Twitter-like microblog in her name is a fake.
snippet: According to Chinese media reports, the mother of the toddler killed in a hit-and-run accident that shocked the country says a Twitter-like microblog in her name is a fake.

headline.main: Mother of Toddler Who Was Run Over Says Microblog Is a Fake
